column4: Yes, I thought about it but my echoes print absolutely nothing even if it is just text. (don't know if the script launches anyway)
Is it ok for me to begin the script with #!/bin/sh or is it better with bash ? (sorry if the question seems silly)
I also tryed with a non conflicting SXX number with the same result
I think #!/bin/sh is ok. I have a few that begin like that and they haven't had problems.
